content: > ***please favorite this pattern in exchange for the free download > thanks *** yes you can wear a cowl in the summer just be sure to use a nice summer yarn such as one of the beautiful cotton or cotton and linen blend yarns available pair this cowl with a tank top and enjoy wearing a crochet project in the summer i used the beautiful juniper moon farm zooey cotton and linen yarn check out the pretty colors of this yarn you can go neutral or pick one of the bright colors you do not have to make a long starting chain to begin the cowl because the yes you can cowl is crocheted from end to end and finished with an easy quick whip stitch seam the stitch pattern is a 4 row-repeat that is easy to memorize and the picot edging is crocheted as you go so when you finish crocheting you are finished you can also add on more repeats and make an infinity scarf this cowl is very fast to crochet and you can make it in one afternoon two balls of the zooey yarn makes three cowls and this makes it the perfect gifting crochet project **copyright cj brady designs 2018**--all photos pdf pattern files and text © cj brady designs 2017-2020 do not post photos text or pdf documents without my permission unauthorized posting of my pdf pattern files is forbidden
